pages.text: The $(marked)Yellow King$(), or Hastur, often associates with mortals, actings as a noble king or protector of shepherds. He is marked by the $(marked)Yellow Sign$(), a sigil which induces madness in those who gaze upon it. His very aura is known to grant people amazing artistic skills, if only as a way to express their $(o)fascination$(). Accordingly, the Yellow King is by far the most popular among the unknowing population.

Those who decide to ascend under him can expect powerful magic and the King's blessing among the people.$(br)Ascending under Hastur involves a lot of interaction with other $(marked)Villagers$() and his $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Serfs$().$(br)Try trading with a $(marked)Yellow Vassal$() if you are interested in the Yellow King's ways.$(br2)$(o)This entry will get expanded as you proceed.$()

pages.title: Act One
pages.text: Introduction to the serfs is as easy as it gets: simply fabricate a $(marked)Idol$() using the $(ml:rites/sculptor_rite)Sculptor Rite$(). The product must be handed to a $(marked)Yellow Vassal$(), who will set you on the King's path. This will change your $(ml:world/affiliation)internal affiliation$() to that of the Yellow King.$(br)Casting this requires $(ml:world/occult_knowledge)Yellow Knowledge$(), acquired from simply interacting with the Vassals.

pages.title: Act Two
pages.text: The next is a bit more elaborate. Perform a $(ml:rites/golden_coronation)Golden Coronation$() and bring forth a $(ml:bestiary/prince)Tattered Prince$(). He will be your guiding hand in this ascension. Once summoned, he will also grant you your first $(ml:goo/hastur_blessings)blessing$(), provided you interact with him. Keep him around, for he will give you another blessing once entertained enough.

pages.title: Act Three
pages.text: To receive your second blessing, you must attend a perfect $(ml:goo/golden_gathering)Golden Gathering$(). This will require your previously summoned $(ml:bestiary/prince)Tattered Prince$() and lead you to the last act.

pages.title: Final Act
pages.text: The final blessing is acquired by setting a piece of the Yellow King into the world, a $(ml:goo/hastur_simulacrum)Simulacrum$(). The Simulacrum of Carcosa is created through the equally named $(ml:rites/hastur_simulacrum)rite$(). This final act will leave you exposed to saboteurs, so make sure to prepare accordingly.
